en.recording_hint:
Press to begin recording suspension data over time.
Ensure you're driving above 40 km/h.
en.recording_in_progress:
Recording in progress.
Data collection is not time-limited.
Press 'Stop Recording' manually once you're satisfied.
en.rms_collected_dyno:
RMS data has been collected.
Apply the calculated suspension setup to your dyno session.
en.rms_collected_other:
RMS data has been collected.
To apply the setup, enter the dyno environment.
en.adaptive_active_hint: Adaptive suspension is actively adjusting values based on real-time data.
en.adaptive_inactive_hint:
Adaptive suspension allows real-time adjustment of suspension stiffness to track conditions.
Use this mode to quickly adapt without manual setup.
en.reaction_speed_hint:
Higher = faster reaction to bumps and load changes
Lower = smoother but less responsive behavior

ru.recording_hint:

ru.rms_collected_dyno:

ru.rms_collected_other:

ru.adaptive_active_hint: Адаптивная подвеска активно настраивается в реальном времени.
